summary: ADDS THE CAST OF FINAL FANTASY 6, PLUS SEVERAL BONUS CHARACTERS. rEMADE WITH NEW HAIRS, COLORS, AND PERKS.
descriptionHtml:
NEW 1.4
*Please endorse if you enjoy this mod.

Now remade with new hairstyles, colors, and perks to make the characters more reflective of the original final fantasy characters by Square-Enix.


This mod is now updated!

I have now added all 14 main characters from Final Fantasy 6. I have also included General Leo, Siegfried, and Ultros as recruitable, and Kefka as a villian. 

As well as the beautiful Darill; have you ever wondered what happened to her after her airship crashed? Did she die? Well now you can find out... delve into the depths of the Soul Cairn to find her lingering on. But the question is, can she ever leave?

Terra - Destruction Mage (Destruction/Conjuration) Riften

Sabin - Combat Monk (Fists/Blades/Light/Restoration/Stealth) Whiterun

Celes - Spellsword (Blades/Restoration/Destruction/Heavy) Riverwood

Locke - Lockpick Trainer (Locks/Blades/Dual/Light/Stealth) Ragged Flagon

Shadow - Combat Assassin (Blades/Dual/Archery/Stealth/Light) Ivarstead

Cyan - 2 handed (Heavy/Greatswords) Markath

Gau - Combat Monk (Fists/Light/Alteration/Stealth) Whiterun

Setzer - Bard (Blades/Archery/Illusion/Stealth/Speech) Bard\'s College

Edgar - Ranger (Light/Archery/Blades) Windhelm

Gogo - Blade (Blades/Destruction/Stealth/Light) Dragon Bridge

Relm - Mystic (Illusion/Conjuration/Restoration) Winterhold

Strago - Combat Necro (Necromancy/Conjuration) Winterhold

Mog - Khajit Spellsword (Destruction/Blades/Heavy) Dawnstar

Umaro - Orc Combat Barbarian (Warhammer/Light/Rage) Jorvasker

General Leo - 1 handed warrior (Blade/Shield/Heavy) Blue Palace

Darill the \"Falcon\" - Scout (Archery/Blade/Stealth/Dual/Restoration/Alteration) Soul Cairn

Seigfried - 2-Handed Warrior (Greatswords/Heavy) Fort Dawnguard

Ultros - Argonian Spellsword (Mace/Destruction/Alteration) Nchuand-Zel

Interceptor - The Awesome pup has been added, but has not been fully tested. (You may need to have completed the Dawnguard quests in order to recruit him. He is a re-named copy of Bran, who I believe can only be recruited after joining the Dawnguard. He can be found in Ivarstead with Shadow)

Kefka is very high level and aggressive to the player. He is located in the north not far from the Shrine of Azura.

*It is important to note that this mod now uses more required files... in particular all of apachiskyhairs mods.


Special Thanks:
I have to give credit to Apachii for the great hair mod. As well as Bethesda for the awesome game. I learned how to make these characters using tutorials found online, so kudo\'s to those folks who post helpful vids.

Also thanks to Netherwalk for being an inspiration in designing companions.


Required Mods:

Dragonborn
Hearthfire

Apachiskyhair 1.5 by Apachi - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
ApachiFemales by Apachi, 1.2 and 1.3
ApachiMales by Apachi
More Hair Colors (I have both files active) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14713

Recommended Mods (But not required):

UFO - Ultimate follower overhaul. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037 
TERA Armors - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846

Fine Face Textures by urshi - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815
Eyes of Beauty - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
Better Facegen - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953
Better Males http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488 
Better Females http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812 
Body mods (Calientes) 
One of the sexy armor mods out there. (Skimpy) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654
SageOutfit http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10710 and/or http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9387 
Cloaks http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092 
Dual Wield
author: scorpiovaeden
